name: VANILLA BEANS PLANIFOLIA
description: Planifolia vanilla beans from Papua New Guinea (PNG) have a traditional creamy flavor that is similar to the Madagascar variety.

name: PAPUA MACE
description: apua mace tastes more delicate than nutmeg and is used for savoury dishes, oriental blends, and spicy vinegar, as well as for preserving vegetables.

name: BLACK PEPPER
description: Black pepper is a flowering vine in the family Piperaceae, cultivated for its fruit, known as a peppercorn, which is used as a spice and seasoning.
